00027     void SimpleProcessFilter::stepping(const G4Step* step) { 
00028 
00029         if (reactionOccurred_) { 
00030             return;
00031         } 
00032         std::cout << "reaction occurred: " << reactionOccurred_ << std::endl;
00033 
00034         // Get the track associated with this step.
00035         G4Track* track = step->GetTrack();
00036 
00037         // If enabled, only process tracks whose parent is equal to the given
00038         // parent ID.
00039         if ((parentID_ != -9999) && (track->GetParentID() != parentID_)) return; 
00040 
00041         // If enabled, only process tracks whose ID is equal to the given
00042         // track ID.
00043         if ((trackID_ != -9999) && (track->GetTrackID() != trackID_)) return;
00044 
00045         // get the PDGID of the track.
00046         G4int pdgID = track->GetParticleDefinition()->GetPDGEncoding();
00047 
00048         // if enabled, only process tracks whose PDG ID is equal to the given
00049         // PDG ID 
00050         if ((pdgID_ != -9999) && (pdgID != pdgID_)) return;
00051 
00052         // Get the volume the particle is in.
00053         G4VPhysicalVolume* volume = track->GetVolume();
00054         G4String volumeName = volume->GetName();
00055 
00056         // If enabled, make sure the particle is in the specified volume. 
00057         // If not, strop processing the track.
00058         if (volumeName.compareTo(volumeName_) != 0) return;
00059 
00060         /*std::cout << "*******************************" << std::endl; 
00061         std::cout << "*   Step " << track->GetCurrentStepNumber() << std::endl;
00062         std::cout << "********************************" << std::endl;*/
00063 
00064         // Get the particle type.
00065         G4String particleName = track->GetParticleDefinition()->GetParticleName();
00066 
00067         // Get the kinetic energy of the particle.
00068         double incidentParticleEnergy = step->GetPreStepPoint()->GetTotalEnergy();
00069 
00070         /*std::cout << "[ SimpleProcessFilter ]: " << "\n" 
00071                     << "\tTotal energy of " << particleName      << " ( PDG ID: " << pdgID
00072                     << " ) : " << incidentParticleEnergy       << "\n"
00073                     << "\tTrack ID: " << track->GetTrackID()     << "\n" 
00074                     << "\tStep #: " << track->GetCurrentStepNumber() << "\n"
00075                     << "\tParticle currently in " << volumeName  << std::endl;*/
00076         
00077         // Get the particles daughters.
00078         const G4TrackVector* secondaries = step->GetSecondary();
00079 
00080         // If the brem photon doesn't undergo any reaction in the target, stop
00081         // processing the rest of the event. 
00082         if (secondaries->size() == 0) {
00083 
00084             /*std::cout << "[ SimpleProcessFilter ]: "
00085                       << particleName << " did not interact in " << volumeName_ 
00086                       << " --> Postponing tracks."
00087                       << std::endl;*/
00088 
00089             track->SetTrackStatus(fKillTrackAndSecondaries);
00090             G4RunManager::GetRunManager()->AbortEvent();
00091             return;
00092         
00093         } else { 
00094        
00095             G4String processName = secondaries->at(0)->GetCreatorProcess()->GetProcessName(); 
00096             
00097             /*std::cout << "[ SimpleProcessFilter ]: "
00098                       << particleName << " produced " << secondaries->size() 
00099                       << " secondaries via " << processName << " process." 
00100                       << std::endl;*/
00101             if (processName.find("biasWrapper") != std::string::npos) { 
00102                 std::size_t pos = processName.find_first_of("(") + 1;
00103                 processName = processName.substr(pos, processName.size() - pos - 1); 
00104             }  
00105 
00106             // Only record the process that is being biased
00107             if (!processName.empty() && (processName.compare(processName_) != 0)) {
00108 
00109                 /*std::cout << "[ SimpleProcessFilter ]: "
00110                           << "Secondaries were not produced via " 
00111                           << processName_ << " --> Killing all tracks!" 
00112                           << std::endl;*/
00113                 track->SetTrackStatus(fKillTrackAndSecondaries);
00114                 G4RunManager::GetRunManager()->AbortEvent();
00115                 return;
00116             }
00117 
00118             std::cout << "[ SimpleProcessFilter ]: "
00119                       << particleName << " produced " << secondaries->size() 
00120                       << " secondaries via " << processName << " process." 
00121                       << std::endl;
00122             BiasingMessenger::setEventWeight(track->GetWeight());
00123             reactionOccurred_ = true;
00124         }
00125     }    
00126     
00127     void SimpleProcessFilter::endEvent(const G4Event*) {
00128         reactionOccurred_ = false; 
00129     }
00130 }
